> Compile regular expressions using named groups to ES5.

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-named-capturing-groups-regex
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-named-capturing-groups-regex --dev
```
